# Kogno - AI-Powered Learning Platform

## About Kogno
Kogno is an AI-powered learning platform that helps students study smarter, not harder. We provide personalized courses, practice exams, cheatsheets, and flashcards that adapt to your learning style.

## Key Features
- AI-generated courses from any topic or document
- Adaptive practice exams with instant feedback
- Smart cheatsheets and study summaries
- Interactive flashcard decks
- Progress tracking and analytics
- Multi-platform desktop app (Windows, macOS, Linux)

## Public Pages
- Homepage: https://kogno.ai
- Download App: https://kogno.ai/download
- LaTeX Reference: https://kogno.ai/help/latex
- Sign In: https://kogno.ai/auth/sign-in
- Create Account: https://kogno.ai/auth/create-account

## How It Works
1. Upload your course materials or describe what you want to learn
2. Kogno's AI generates a personalized study plan
3. Learn through interactive lessons, quizzes, and practice problems
4. Track your progress and identify areas for improvement
5. Generate practice exams to test your knowledge

## Target Users
- University and college students
- High school students
- Self-learners and professionals
- Anyone preparing for exams

## Subject Areas
Kogno supports all academic subjects including:
- Mathematics and Statistics
- Physics and Engineering
- Computer Science
- Biology and Chemistry
- Economics and Business
- Humanities and Social Sciences

## Contact
Website: https://kogno.ai
Support: support@kogno.ai

## Technical Information
- Built with Next.js and React
- Desktop app built with Electron
- Available on Windows, macOS (Intel and Apple Silicon), and Linux

Last updated: 2025
